website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive tower fan that won't take up a lot of space and offers user-friendly features.
pros: Boasts a trim design that works well in smaller rooms
cons: Several customers complained of malfunctions after a fairly short time

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my Igenix fan
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Igenix fan. It's more powerful than my existing one. It keeps me cool by day & I take it upstairs at night. It's brilliant. I have it on all night on number 2 setting. I'm sleeping well. I don't find it noisy. I tried to reorder but out of stock. So I've ordered a Igenix 29 inch DF0035T just for my bedroom. I hope it will be as good.
customer_reviews.author: sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Superb fan!!
customer_reviews.text: It was super fast next day free delivery. I am extremely happy about my purchase. It is beautiful very low noise and high performance fan. value for money highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Good cooling
customer_reviews.text: The fan works very well and I recommend , I have both ansio for living room which is my number one but more expensive and this one in my doughter bed room ,I read in reviews a common mistake when people complained about clicking noise that happens if you rotate the timer by mistake and keep making this notice untill the time lapse and you can't stop it the way to use is is keep the wheel at on and press one of the three buttons 1 or 2 or 3 and press the button off to stop never rotate the wheel or you get that irriating noise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant on those hot summer night to keep you cool, well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great fan when i first brought it until it snapped
customer_reviews.text: This was a great fan when i first brought it until it snapped, i dont move it around much and used it on a daily basic and them the stand on it broke, i only had this for like 2 months now and its snapped. You can not send it back because their no button or a button to email the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Must have in the heat
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me over the last few weeks, keeps you very cool at night allowing for a comfortable sleep. Sound isn't that noticeable either.
customer_reviews.author: NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Slick and fairly powerful
customer_reviews.text: Slick and neutral, can fit anywhere. Would be nice if it was a bit bigger, but size seems to be above average for the market anyway (if you want to stay below £50). Timer function goes up to 2 hours -- could also be longer imo Volume: really hard to comment on because is my first proper fan. Honestly it's a normal, non-invasive "hum" that seems to be about average volume. It emits the *same* sound without producing any fluctuating or weird noises, which means that it just blends into the background and consequently you don't even think about it. Power: All fine; I recommend settings 2-3. All in all - for the price, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy , and it stops working occasionally and I have to switch it off and it doesn't blow very far waste of money ;(
customer_reviews.author: Lucie pike

customer_reviews.title: Not the coolest
customer_reviews.text: Not very cool even on the highest setting. Price was good size is good. Oscillating is good and timer is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great product & good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It saved me through the hot weeks this summer! Powerful fan with 3 speed settings which combined with the oscillation feature quickly cools the room down. It takes up little space and can be left in a corner when not in use. I will continue to use it through the winter in the kitchen when cooking because it takes up such a small space. Unlike the traditional fans that are so bulky. Brilliant product, especially considering the cost, I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Takes up very little space ,works great
customer_reviews.text: I put mine in a Amazon bluetooth plug so over summer I was able to switch it on for my dog when out of the house. Great peace of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I saw from other reviews that they could hear a clicking sound when the fab was not working. Funny enough there is this clicking sound when it is not plugged in at all, but it's very minimal. The seller was very communicative, informing me about the black fan being out of stock so I was very happy with that. The fan itself seems very powerful for a bedroom and as a person who can't stand heat at all, it is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Konstantina

customer_reviews.title: ****NOT SILENT****
customer_reviews.text: This fan is advertised as silent!!! This thing is far from silent!! It’s a good fan and really controllable as far as speed, oscillation are concerned. The fan however is loud and we wouldn’t recommend using this in the bedroom (unless you are profoundly deaf!)
customer_reviews.author: Dave Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using approx. 30 times
customer_reviews.text: The fan worked well to begin with - but I only used it about thirty times since I bought it five months ago and it is already broken. I have asked the seller to replace the item, but that hasn’t been organised. I am very upset and hope this is resolved - otherwise I could not be able to recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne B.

customer_reviews.title: Cooler than normal fans
customer_reviews.text: We have a standard round fan that just moved warm air around but got this more compact one for the home office. It is surprisingly cool and the output seems several degrees lower. Add the small footprint and I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: patsy

customer_reviews.title: Space saving
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for his bedroom which is quite small and it fits in no problem. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Snagged one of these during the peak of summer, great price for a decent product. It's your typical tower fan, not overly large, doesn't take up much floor space, easy to move around from room to room as needed. Little bit noisy but no more so than other fans, either way it's not caused any issues on conference calls despite being right next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - summer must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan that looks good too! My partner is a heavily pregnant and light sleeper and we were worried about ordering a tower fan offline and it is perfect - very quiet sound, even on the highest setting. The timer is a great function too so I don't have to get out of bed to turn it off for her! :) This purchase has been a life saver for my partner we both love it - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A great product, easy to set up. 3 speeds with a timer function. If you put the fan on timer and then override the timer the fan will continue to tick as if on timer but if left this noise stops. Quiet enough to have on all night which we have frequently. Very good
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish looking and does the job
customer_reviews.text: The fan is only as loud as others of similar value, however if your like me, you may appreciate the white noise of a fan to aid sleep so if you prefer a quiet night sleep then it's not ideal, that isnt to say this fan is particularly loud however. The power of the fan is good, comes almost fully assembled and just needs a stand putting on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Cian Hughes

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This item love it great for this weather just love it the time is good for me as my disablity i cant leave it to turn ofg myself GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Works well, doesn’t make much noise and you can feel the coolness on the other side of the room. So far, very happy Haven’t used the auto shut off feature yet
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: It broke. After 3 months and limited use as it was mainly used at night for noise cancellation, it doesn’t switch in. The timer was loose within the first week and now it doesn’t connect to turn the fan on. What a waste of money for a fan than lasts 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Nurock

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for kids bedroom, keeps room cool. A little noisy but it's expected of a fan, besides the white noise helps the kids fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: R2D214

customer_reviews.title: Time stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: Time stopped working after a week so I can't recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. J. Trafford

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice item not as bulking as some fans gives a lovely fresh breeze not overly powerful. Wick delivery
customer_reviews.author: clare

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 - wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and look fantastic. Only used once so far but was great and hopefully they will get some hammer this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Groves

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan but with an annoying noise
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice fan that can blow really cool hair and would recommend it. However i am not sure if it is a faulty one or it happens in all of the fans but when the fan is in on mode there is an annoying tiking sound coming that can only be stopped by putting it into '0'. Its a small inconvenience but it can be fixed easily whilst manufacturing it
customer_reviews.author: George J.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fan blows well never needed to to go higher than level 1 and timer function great for going to sleep on a hot night.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Noisey and broke with 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Produced smoke and the motor stopped working. Thankfully I was home and could unplug and put straight in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie wilson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this fan, I previously had a tall pedastal fan but this one is way better.
customer_reviews.author: sam L

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. Quiet enough not to notice it over the tv. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: This product is very loud.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fan. I wanted something stylish and sleek which this is, But it's incredibly loud on all settings. The cheap as chips old one ive got in the bedroom (not your product) is really quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Silent bliss
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically well made tower fan that runs virtually 100% silent on all 3 settings, have found setting 2 is the best if running 24/0
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the price. Larger than expected and very powerful even on low setting!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Not too noisy, better than a conventional fan and fits better in corners of a room
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fan
customer_reviews.text: Great stylish fan, very little noise and works well and keeps me cool. Haven't tried timer function
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tc Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great perfect working order Fast and reliable delivery service Good air flow cools room down quickly
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Sleek looking but is quite loud. Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.author: holly miller

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Cools the room down nicely! Can't live without this on hot nights! Great product, thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product good space saver and does the job well
customer_reviews.author: peterjones

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan which cools really well, simple to use, easy to move around and incredibly effective. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dundas-Todorov

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Better than other fans I’ve had, it’s so compact and easy to store away, that’s a bonus
customer_reviews.author: SAMMY

customer_reviews.title: Ok fan
customer_reviews.text: Good fan. A little noisy. Doesn’t cool air but does blow it well
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bits of kit I have ever purchased. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mr SARC

customer_reviews.title: Great fan if not sure what to buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good fan and picked it up for a good price. Blows cool air and makes a genuine difference on hot nights. Bit noisy, but I need some noise to sleep so i dont mind. If you're unsure of a fan to buy this one is great, not very tall mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use bought this in the heatwave so it served its purpose. It has only 3 settings so dont expect a lot but definitely worth the money paid
customer_reviews.author: Kimona

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool  with the tower fan
customer_reviews.text: I like the tower fan so much I ordered one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but does an amazing job
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid it does the job! It’s not quiet but it’s not stupidly loud! Nice cool strong breeze Overall very very happy with the item considering it is one of the cheaper ones on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Viaela R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fan, the only thing is that the noise isn’t as quiet as I expected from reading the reviews prior to buying. However, this wasn’t a selling point for me as I just wanted a fan
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but there's a clicking sound
customer_reviews.text: When the fan is oscillating there's a really annoying clicking sound that makes it a bit of a pain when you're trying to get to sleep - but otherwise the fan works well!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Bit noisy at night when timer is on but good value and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Stocker

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with noise level
customer_reviews.text: I typed in for silent fans but this NOT even quite never mind silent
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Claire Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this fan. Even on setting 1 you can feel a difference.
customer_reviews.author: A. Messham

customer_reviews.title: All around good fan.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good fan, timer is useful, it's not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel B.

customer_reviews.title: Effective if a bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: The fan is great- noisy when set to oscillate so I wouldn’t sleep with it on- but it cools the room down nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this fan. I bought it as we dont have much storage space as it is easy to store standing in a cupboard. It is powerful and kept us cool on the hottest day on record!! For the price I am very happy with this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Louella

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Good fan for the money but a bit noisy on the 3rd setting.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jones

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work well cool air doesnt even reach you and it is noisy
customer_reviews.author: James carter

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, value for money
customer_reviews.text: It works well in a small room, it does not disturb sleep (noise level is low), haven't tried the timer function, don't think it had a remote. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kakia

customer_reviews.title: Received on time.
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty but not used yet. Received today. Just tried it and it works. It's a bit light on the ground though but I like it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Myself

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for its worth
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s still loud even when on the first level, for the price I think it should be lower, only good thing about it, it was easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Aysha Mulla

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase of this model
customer_reviews.text: Looks good & performs well - value for money. Bought same model 2yrs+ ago & had no hesitation in buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: david b

customer_reviews.title: It is good for now but will consider one with remote control in the near future.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, but lacks a remote control. It’s is noisy and not quiet as stated in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and value for money and performance I would for sure recommend this fan
customer_reviews.author: anees shaik

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, not just because of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Been keeping me sane in my muggy apartment. Noise isn't bad, I can fall asleep with it on and the timing function allows it to shut off after I fall asleep so I don't get too cold at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Fan
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to store, it doesn't take up much room. Assembly was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud creaking fan!
customer_reviews.text: Fan is good for helping to keep rooms cool... but it creaks so loud on rotation that it wakes me up! I bough 4 in total and all four are very noisy!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Pattle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan, especially for this hot weather. I got 2, one for work one for home.
customer_reviews.author: aspearberry

customer_reviews.title: Decent!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively quiet, timer function is useful. Could do a lot worse for the price
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Not white, lilac
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the WHITE however it is LILAC. I chose white so it was unobtrusive against my white walls but instead it sticks out like a sore thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Its working fine, wind is strong enough, quite quiet so far, good one for summer
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant fan. I don't like noisy fans and this one very quiet. Would definitely recommend, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: Silent to run and provides cool breeze when kept close to you
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose during few days of heat. Pretty silent and looks great in a modern living room
customer_reviews.author: Kosg

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a desk type fan
customer_reviews.text: A life saver at this time of year. Much better than a desk type fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was not delivered to me
customer_reviews.text: I cant really rate this item as it wasnt actually delivered to me and I couldn't work out who it was actually delivered to.
customer_reviews.author: leighton marjoram

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good fan, it works and the hum from it is like a white noise machine. Best nights sleep I’ve had in ages. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good fan but broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Fan and timer works great, pretty quiet too .however in 2 weeks the oscillation has already broken and it won't move.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Lannon

customer_reviews.title: This fan is not Quiet too much noise
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing good to say about this product is just I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nargis Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Decent fan could be quieter but overly all a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rackham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality and is very quiet. Good for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sam partridge

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Broken within literally a month! SO SO BAD. Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lorimer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty radical device that has had 0 malfunctions so far. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Ewan McGilvery

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: A bit noisy but blows very cool air. Good purchase & good price
customer_reviews.author: Precious B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The different setting options are great and offer some relief during hotter nights.
customer_reviews.author: Beki Swinfield

customer_reviews.title: Good product low noise
customer_reviews.text: Really good product saved us through this heat we are having
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived with two base parts the same so cannot assemble....
customer_reviews.author: Arlene van Bosch

customer_reviews.title: great does what it says on the box
customer_reviews.text: great does what it says on the box , not to loud , but def usual sound of a fan.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and does not take up half the room
customer_reviews.author: Sue Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very good fan for the price, I have 2. All fans are noisy and can take a bit to get used to if your going to sleep with it on. As some other comments mentioned a clicking noise, this only happens if it's been on using the "on" function and not the timer function. It's because it isn't turned off properly and is still set at "on" when you've pressed the off button, just set it back to 0 and make sure it's off and it won't click. Hope that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak and loud fan
customer_reviews.text: Worst Fan I've ever bought hands down. I don't usually make product reviews but this was such a waste of money I had to. Avoid buying this fan it is incredibly weak and also loud at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kunal

customer_reviews.title: Oscillating/Static fan
customer_reviews.text: Keeping top table at Burns supper cool for major speakers, Immortal Memory, address to the haggis, toast to the lasses and Chairman. Large hall with 140 guests. Another 2 situated in areas to keep air moving, as air conditioning unit wasn't working. Had them all on for 6 hrs. with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: James Baillie

customer_reviews.title: Effective, good speed and oscillation.
customer_reviews.text: Our third electric fan became a necessity thus summer when it became too hot to sleep. This made the room feel cooler even when there was no breeze and it felt stifling. It seems to be able to reduce the temperature ( not sure how when it just moves air?) and it was a godsend. Variable speed and oscillation can be on or off. Reasonably quiet but of course the higher speeds are louder. Timer works well too. Nice to have it in black so it doesn’t look too jarring in a home environment.
customer_reviews.author: Ms c cameron

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and sleek looking.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and on time. Bought this ahead of the expected hot weather and very glad I did. Quick and easy to assemble and simple to use. Sleek looking, fits in any place. This fan is light and convenient to move to another room. Very quiet even on the highest setting, can’t hear it above the telly. Put on the lowest setting when going to sleep. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: COOL!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents as they commented on a similar one that I have. Having waited till it was really hot in the summer, no shops had any left in store. Thankfully this arrived within 2 days to save the day. We like the timer function, ideal for at night. Barely any noise from it so not only can you drift off to sleep easily but also watch the TV without being disturbed.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 weeks now and I can say that I am very happy with it. Noise level is ok for a fan, they all make noise but this didn't annoy me even at level 3, it rotates smoothly and because it's slim it's very easy to put in corners or small spaces. I bought the black which was a few pounds more than the white but it looks much better. Lightweight and easy to store. I am very pleased with this product and will provide an update in a few months
customer_reviews.author: Sophie R.

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with how cool the air was from this. Slim and efficient. Can rotate or not and has three speed settings. Great for smaller rooms due to slim size. Has a long cable too.
customer_reviews.author: square cheese

customer_reviews.title: A little penguin blowing air
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, it doesn't stand out in a room, you put it in a corner and it works in the shadows. The air that blows for some reason is colder then expected wich is very good. It has 3 speeds and and a 120 degrees in range of rotation, the design is simple and I just personally think it looks like a little penguin blowing air.
customer_reviews.author: FlawlessBenHD

customer_reviews.title: Looks stylish and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cooling fan not a hearing fan so the five stars I’ve given for “warmth” refer to cooling. It’s more powerful than my last floor stand oscillating fan which it replaces, so that’s a plus. Not too noisy and I like the black finish as it won’t yellow like white plastic does.
customer_reviews.author: Cazbocat

customer_reviews.title: just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this item was not sure how it would be like and if it would do the job, I have to say that this is just the job that I needed during this hot weather would recommend this to you if you can not get to sleep during the hot spell
customer_reviews.author: baz
